articles.title: Steam Machine: Valve rivals Xbox and PlayStation with new console - BBC
articles.description: The Steam Machine is a console designed to allow gamers to play PC games on their TV.

articles.title: Samsung’s trifold gets a name and ‘confirmed’ specs - The Verge
articles.description: The Galaxy Z TriFold could launch on December 5th.

articles.title: The Next Horizon Game Is an MMO for Mobile and PC, Prompting Fury from PS5 Fans - Push Square
Android will let ‘experienced users’ sideload unverified apps as Google makes case for verification - 9to5Google
articles.description: In August, Google announced that it will require developer verification to install Android apps, including through sideloading. That’s continuing, but Google is working on a solution for “experienced users.”

articles.title: Black Ops 7 Day One Patch Notes: Weapon buffs & nerfs, Zombies changes, more - Dexerto
articles.description: Ahead of the game’s launch, devs have revealed the full Black Ops 7 Day One patch notes. Here’s the rundown.
